name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Russian Drift Style
detailed_description:
A city of classic architecture: 300 year old buildings, raising bridges and picturesque parks, it’s all Saint-Petersburg. Its streets have been fenced out for the race so you should get ready to spin your steering wheel to pass a few roundabouts, drift along wide city avenues and avoid sleeping off the track on sharp turns.
DLC Russian Drift Style allows access to the track:
  • St.Petersburg
